verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei Now after מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> Mot the death יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a', of Joshua וַֽיִּשְׁאֲלוּ֙ <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'a-Lu asked בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei it came to pass that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בַּיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who יַעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-leh- Who shall go up לָּ֧נוּ La-nu אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni for us against the Canaanites בַּתְּחִלָּ֖ה <S%H8462><s%> bat-te-chil-Lah first לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-La-chem to fight בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah יַעֲלֶ֑ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh; shall go up הִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh behold נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-ti behold I have delivered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do. into his hand

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוּדָה֩ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah And Judah לְשִׁמְע֨וֹן <S%H8095><s%> le-shim-'on unto Simeon אָחִ֜יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv his brother עֲלֵ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh Come up אִתִּ֣י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti into בְגוֹרָלִ֗י <S%H1486><s%> ve-go-ra-Li, with me into my lot וְנִֽלָּחֲמָה֙ <S%H3898><s%> ve-nil-la-cha-Mah that we may fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> bak-ke-na-'a-Ni, against the Canaanites וְהָלַכְתִּ֧י <S%H1980><s%> ve-ha-lach-Ti and I likewise will go גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- turn אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Cha for בְּגוֹרָלֶ֑ךָ <S%H1486><s%> be-go-ra-Le-cha; with thee into thy lot וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To So שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on. So Simeon

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al went up יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, And Judah וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten delivered יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכְּנַעֲנִ֥י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֖י <S%H6522><s%> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi and the Perizzites בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dam; into their hand וַיַּכּ֣וּם <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Kum and they slew בְּבֶ֔זֶק <S%H966><s%> be-Ve-zek, of them in Bezek עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <S%H6235><s%> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish. men

וַֽ֠יִּמְצְאוּ <S%H4672><s%> Vai-yim-tze-'u And they found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲדֹנִ֥י 'a-do-Ni בֶ֙זֶק֙ <S%H137><s%> ve-zek Adonibezek בְּבֶ֔זֶק <S%H966><s%> be-Ve-zek, in Bezek וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu and they fought בּ֑וֹ bo; וַיַּכּ֕וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku against him and they slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַפְּרִזִּֽי׃ <S%H6522><s%> hap-pe-riz-Zi. and the Perizzites

וַיָּ֙נָס֙ <S%H5127><s%> vai-Ya-nos fled אֲדֹ֣נִי 'a-Do-ni בֶ֔זֶק <S%H137><s%> Ve-zek, But Adonibezek וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <S%H7291><s%> vai-yir-de-Fu and they pursued אַחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav; after וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּ <S%H270><s%> vai-yo-cha-Zu him and caught אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וַֽיְקַצְּצ֔וּ <S%H7112><s%> vay-katz-tze-Tzu, him and cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּהֹנ֥וֹת <S%H931><s%> be-ho-Not his thumbs יָדָ֖יו <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav and his great וְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> ve-rag-Lav. and his great toes

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲדֹֽנִי־ 'a-do-ni- בֶ֗זֶק <S%H137><s%> Ve-zek, And Adonibezek שִׁבְעִ֣ים׀ <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im Threescore and ten מְלָכִ֡ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim kings בְּֽהֹנוֹת֩ <S%H931><s%> be-ho-nOt their thumbs יְדֵיהֶ֨ם <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei-Hem and their great וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H7272><s%> ve-rag-lei-Hem and their great toes מְקֻצָּצִ֗ים <S%H7112><s%> me-kutz-tza-Tzim, cut off הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become מְלַקְּטִים֙ <S%H3950><s%> me-lak-ke-Tim gathered תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat up under שֻׁלְחָנִ֔י <S%H7979><s%> shul-cha-Ni, [their meat] under my table כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher I עָשִׂ֔יתִי <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti, as I have done כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so שִׁלַּם־ <S%H7999><s%> shil-lam- hath requited לִ֖י li אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; so God וַיְבִיאֻ֥הוּ <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'U-hu me And they brought יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim him to Jerusalem וַיָּ֥מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot and there he died שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there פ Peh

וַיִּלָּחֲמ֤וּ <S%H3898><s%> vai-yil-la-cha-Mu had fought בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- Now the children יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-Ru-sha-Lim, against Jerusalem וַיִּלְכְּד֣וּ <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-ke-Du and had taken אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah, וַיַּכּ֖וּהָ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku-ha it and smitten לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> le-fi- it with the edge חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev; of the sword וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir the city שִׁלְּח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> shil-le-Chu and set בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> va-'Esh. on fire

וְאַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char, And afterward יָֽרְדוּ֙ <S%H3381><s%> ya-re-Du went down בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <S%H3898><s%> le-hil-la-Chem to fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <S%H3669><s%> bak-ke-na-'a-Ni; against the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev that dwelt הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har, in the mountain וְהַנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> ve-han-Ne-gev and in the south וְהַשְּׁפֵלָֽה׃ <S%H8219><s%> ve-hash-she-fe-Lah. and in the valley

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, And Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni against the Canaanites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <S%H2275><s%> be-chev-Ron, in Hebron וְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> ve-shem- (now the name חֶבְר֥וֹן <S%H2275><s%> chev-Ron of Hebron לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nim before קִרְיַ֣ת kir-Yat אַרְבַּ֑ע <S%H7153><s%> 'ar-Ba'; Kirjath-arba וַיַּכּ֛וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku beat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁשַׁ֥י <S%H8344><s%> she-Shai Sheshai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲחִימַ֖ן <S%H289><s%> 'a-chi-Man and Ahiman וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et תַּלְמָֽי׃ <S%H8526><s%> tal-Mai. and Talmai

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went מִשָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham, there אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against יוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei against the inhabitants דְּבִ֑יר <S%H1688><s%> de-Vir; of Debir וְשֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> ve-shem- and the name דְּבִ֥יר <S%H1688><s%> de-Vir of Debir לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nim before קִרְיַת־ kir-yat- סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H7158><s%> Se-fer. [was] Kirjathsepher

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said כָּלֵ֔ב <S%H3612><s%> ka-Lev, And Caleb אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יַכֶּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> yak-Keh He that smiteth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קִרְיַת־ kir-yat- סֵ֖פֶר <S%H7158><s%> Se-fer Kirjathsepher וּלְכָדָ֑הּ <S%H3920><s%> u-le-cha-Dah; and taketh וְנָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tat-ti it to him will I give ל֛וֹ lo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַכְסָ֥ה <S%H5915><s%> 'ach-Sah Achsah בִתִּ֖י <S%H1323><s%> vit-Ti my daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וַֽיִּלְכְּדָהּ֙ <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-ke-Dah took עָתְנִיאֵ֣ל <S%H6274><s%> 'a-te-ni-'El And Othniel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son קְנַ֔ז <S%H7073><s%> ke-Naz, of Kenaz אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother כָלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> cha-Lev Caleb's הַקָּטֹ֣ן <S%H6996><s%> hak-ka-Ton younger מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; at וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-ten- it and he gave ל֛וֹ lo אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַכְסָ֥ה <S%H5915><s%> 'ach-Sah him Achsah בִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> vit-To his daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah. to wife

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בְּבוֹאָ֗הּ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'Ah, And it came to pass when she came וַתְּסִיתֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5496><s%> vat-te-si-Te-hu [to him] that she moved לִשְׁא֤וֹל <S%H7592><s%> lish-'ol him to ask מֵֽאֵת־ <S%H853><s%> me-'et- אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha of her father הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, a field וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <S%H6795><s%> vat-titz-Nach and she lighted מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from הַחֲמ֑וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ha-cha-Mor; from off [her] ass וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-mer- said לָ֥הּ lah כָּלֵ֖ב <S%H3612><s%> ka-Lev and Caleb מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- to her What לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer And she said ל֜וֹ lo הָֽבָה־ <S%H3051><s%> ha-vah- unto him Give לִּ֣י li בְרָכָ֗ה <S%H1293><s%> ve-ra-Chah, me a blessing כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki since אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz land הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <S%H5045><s%> han-Ne-gev me a south נְתַתָּ֔נִי <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Ta-ni, for thou hast given וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Tah give לִ֖י li גֻּלֹּ֣ת <S%H1543><s%> gul-Lot me also springs מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; of water וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-ten- gave לָ֣הּ lah כָּלֵ֗ב <S%H3612><s%> ka-Lev, And Caleb אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et גֻּלֹּ֣ת <S%H1543><s%> gul-Lot springs עִלִּ֔ית <S%H5942><s%> 'il-Lit, her the upper וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גֻּלֹּ֥ת <S%H1543><s%> gul-Lot springs תַּחְתִּֽית׃ <S%H8482><s%> tach-Tit. and the nether פ Peh

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the children קֵינִי֩ <S%H7017><s%> kei-Ni of the Kenite חֹתֵ֨ן <S%H2859><s%> cho-Ten father in law מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses' עָל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu went up מֵעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> me-'Ir out of the city הַתְּמָרִים֙ <S%H8558><s%> hat-te-ma-Rim of palms אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei with the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah מִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> mid-Bar into the wilderness יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּנֶ֣גֶב <S%H5045><s%> be-Ne-gev which [lieth] in the south עֲרָ֑ד <S%H6166><s%> 'a-Rad; of Arad וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and dwelt אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. the people

וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah And Judah אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with שִׁמְע֣וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on with Simeon אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv, his brother וַיַּכּ֕וּ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku and they slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev that inhabited צְפַ֑ת <S%H6857><s%> tze-Fat; Zephath וַיַּחֲרִ֣ימוּ <S%H2763><s%> vai-ya-cha-Ri-mu and utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah, וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra was called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- it And the name הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir of the city חָרְמָֽה׃ <S%H2767><s%> cha-re-Mah. Hormah
